COMMANDS_UTILS_LYRICS_NOTCORRECT: %EMOJI_BULB%  Search results are not correct! If result is not correct, try re-search with artist name!
COMMANDS_MONEY_BOT: %EMOJI_MONEY%  I think this user is a bot!
COMMANDS_MONEY_UNREGI: %EMOJI_MONEY% This user is not a registered user (not using %BOT_NAME%)!
HANDLE_COMMANDS_DEFAULT_TEXT: %EMOJI_NO%  **%SERVER%** server can only use my command on channel <#%CHANNEL%>!
HANDLE_COMMANDS_ERROR:
> %EMOJI_WARN%  An unexpected error occurred while processing the command.
> %EMOJI_WARN%  Please copy the following error code and pass it to the developer!
> %EMOJI_BULB%  Error code: ``%UUID%``
AUDIO_NO_NODES: > %EMOJI_BULB%  Currently available nodes do not exist!
UNABLE_USE_COMMAND_SHUTDOWN: > %EMOJI_NO%  Command cannot be used when the bot is shutting down..
AUDIO_LISTEN_PLEASE: > %EMOJI_NO%  Please turn on your listening status!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_STOP_OK: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  The player has stopped and the queue has been cleared.
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETDJ_SET: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a role as a DJ ``%DJNAME%``
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETDJ_NONE: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a role as a DJ **%NONE%**
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETTC_SET: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a command channel %CHANNEL%!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETTC_NONE: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a command channel **%NONE%**!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETVC_SET: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a voice channel %CHANNEL%!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETVC_NONE: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a voice channel **%NONE%**!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_PLAY_ADDED_SINGLE: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  Added **%TRACK% [%DURATION%]** to the queue at position **%POSITION%**
COMMANDS_AUDIO_PLAY_PLAYLIST_ADDED_PLAYL: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  Found playlist with **%NUM%** entries, added to the queue!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_PLAY_PLAYLIST_ADD_ASK_PLA: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  This track has a playlist of **%NUM%** tracks attached. Will you load playlist?
COMMANDS_AUDIO_PLAY_NO_VOICE_ME: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  First, please add me your voice channel!
COMMANDS_SKIP_SKIP_REQUESTED: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  You voted to skip **%REQUEST%** - %TITLE%. [%CURRENT% votes, Requires %TOSKIP% votes]
COMMANDS_CHANGELOG_NO: > %EMOJI_NO%  Developers have changed the log do not exist to commit! **(%COMMITSHA%)**

%EMOJI_HEADPHONES%  DJ Role: **%DJROLE%**
%EMOJI_SPEAKER%  Default voice channel: **%VCH%**

%EMOJI_BIN%  Swear Filter: **%FILTER%**
